entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet/cecil links to cecil.pe which is an unrelated website #90865
  • Exception on `MakeGenericMethod` called on a static interface method from `GetInterfaceMap`'s `TargetMethods` for a default interface implementation #90863
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IEnumerable<int> for Range #90861
  • .net8.0.0-preview.7.23375.6, nativeaot, [Serializable] feature does not work #90860
  • IAsyncEnumerator question - clear Current when MoveNextAsync is called #90855

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: `IndexOfAnyValues<string>` #85573
    9.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Avoid `Enum.HasFlag` #90857
  • Compiler Error CS0407 'return-type method' has the wrong return type #90858
  • StringMarshaller can't handle strings created by malloc on Windows. #90856

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Type.ContainsGenericParameters for function pointers #90864
    area-System.Reflection

Merged

  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0

Updated

  • [mono] Initialize module's image ALC for dynamic objects #90731
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [WIP] new synchronization mechnism for DATAS #90726
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome version used for testing #90823
    arch-wasm
  • Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90796
    area-System.Reflection
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Update Package readme guidelines with new template #90842
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Case: The method has not been jitted yet #90821
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #90488
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add Retry and Task.Delay to WinHttpHandler AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite test #90824
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Remove the minopts policy against cctors #90792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to relauch DotNet via Ctrl+R when DotNet is unable to open dll file #34786
  • DOTNET_GENERATE_ASPNET_CERTIFICATE environment variable ignored in dotnet CLI first-time use flow #34779

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add ProjectCapability for Native AOT properties. #34485
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Allow PublishSingleFile and PublishAot specified simultaneously #34419
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2247970 #34778
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Feature Request] Inline using statement for disposables passed directly #42370
    Backlog

Updated

  • Error when using collection-expression for an array-typed attribute argument. #69133
    17.8
  • `ImmutableList<T>` on net7 and compiler-expression-conversions. #69521
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ctor to Stack Trace Explorer #69630
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support for reporting non-local LSP pull document diagnostics for open documents #69541
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Implement ref switch expressions #69575
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: endpoint #50216
  • How to publish .net 8 preview 7 blazor wasm AOT to github pages #50215
  • [Blazor] Support for parametless segments/include #50214
  • [.NET 8 Preview 7] PageTitle doesn't update when disabling Prerendering using Blazor Web App #50209

Closed

  • Can we use Redis backplane to persist and read negotiate tokens to avoid sticky sessions in load balanced environment? #50171
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #50210

PullRequests

Created

  • refactor : Remove unwanted area specific `editorconfig`. #50211
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • added builder config - appsettings to BlazorWeb template #50208
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2248198 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Local development build improvements #50205
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Extend `PersistKeysToDbContext` (#49329) #50011
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-20
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Mention dotnet-heapview as x-plat tool for viewing .gcdump files #4147

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MarkupExtension: IRootObjectProvider not available in release mode #16881
  • FontImage glyphs are clipped on Android #16880
  • MediaPicker.CaptureVideoAsync() returns null on Android API 33 (Android 13.0) #16879

PullRequests

Created

  • Set Mapper/Handler ctor to protected on migration handlers #16882

Updated

  • Use the x86 emulator for API 27 #16869
  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Merge main into net8.0 #16876
  • Improve the control over resource generation #16845
    .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16872
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect type mapping gets created for nullable value property when using converter lambda overload #31522
  • Missing lambda-based value converter model building APIs for ElementTypeBuilder.HasConversion #31514

Closed

  • Assertion failure when saving entity without setting primitive required collection property #31513
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 7.0.9 to 7.0.10 #31518
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.35.2 to 3.35.3 #31517
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.9.0 to 1.10.0 #31519
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.2.0 to 8.2.1 #31520
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31516
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Throw if required primitive collection is null when saving changes #31521
  • Add some enum generic constraints #31515

Updated

  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.55.0 #31296
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
